Structs/ManagedObjectsChange.html#/s:10I.name: objects
Structs/ManagedObjectsChange.html#/s:10I.abstract: The managed objects which have been changed.

Structs/ManagedObjectChange.html#/s:10IN.name: object
Structs/ManagedObjectChange.html#/s:10IN.abstract: The managed object which has been changed.

Structs/ManagedNotification.html#/s:10IN.name: objectChanged
Structs/ManagedNotification.html#/s:10IN.abstract: A notification that posts when the managed object has changed, e.g. in a different context.

Structs/ManagedNotification.html#/s:10IN.name: contextSaved
Structs/ManagedNotification.html#/s:10IN.abstract: A notification that posts when the context completes a save.

Structs/ManagedNotification.html.name: ManagedNotification
Structs/ManagedNotification.html.abstract: The notification emitted by a managed object.

Structs/ManagedObjectChange.html.name: ManagedObjectChange
Structs/ManagedObjectChange.html.abstract: The published event when a managed object might change.

Structs/ManagedObjectsChange.html.name: ManagedObjectsChange
Structs/ManagedObjectsChange.html.abstract: The published event when multiple managed objects might change.

Protocols/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCo.name: mainContext
Protocols/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCo.abstract: This is the main MOC and acts as the “Single Source of Truth”.

Protocols/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCo.name: createNewContext()
Protocols/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCo.abstract: Creates a new managed object context of the main context.

Protocols/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCo.name: persist()
Protocols/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCo.abstract: Saves the main context synchronously by syncing any changes to the hidden background context.

Protocols/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCo.name: persist(fromBackgroundContext:)
Protocols/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCo.abstract: Saves the content of the background context synchronously back into the main context

Protocols/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCo.name: publisher(managedObject:notificationType:changeTypes:)
Protocols/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCo.abstract: Returns a publisher which emits events for changes on a managed object.

Protocols/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCo.name: publisher(managedObjectType:context:notificationType:changeTypes:)
Protocols/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCo.abstract: Returns a publisher which emits events for changes on any object

Protocols/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCo.name: publisher(managedObjectType:context:changeTypes:)
Protocols/CoreDataManager.html#/s:10INCo.abstract: Returns a publisher which emits events for changes on any object

Extensions/NSManagedObject.html#/s:So15N.name: inContext(_:)
Extensions/NSManagedObject.html#/s:So15N.abstract: Get an object from a desired context using the objectID which

Enums/ManagedObjectChangeType.html#/s:10.name: inserted
Enums/ManagedObjectChangeType.html#/s:10.abstract: An object has been added to a context.

Enums/ManagedObjectChangeType.html#/s:10.name: deleted
Enums/ManagedObjectChangeType.html#/s:10.abstract: An object has been deleted from a context.

Enums/CoreDataManagerError.html#/s:10INC.name: storeFolderCouldNotBeCreated(path:)
Enums/CoreDataManagerError.html#/s:10INC.abstract: The folder for the given path could not be created.

Enums/CoreDataManagerError.html#/s:10INC.name: persistentStoreCouldNotBeCreated(path:)
Enums/CoreDataManagerError.html#/s:10INC.abstract: The persistent store could not be created at the given path.

Enums/CoreDataManagerError.html.name: CoreDataManagerError
Enums/CoreDataManagerError.html.abstract: Errors which can occur while creating a CoreDataManager and its persistence stack.

Classes/CoreDataManagerLogic.html#/s:10I.name: defaultDataModelName
Classes/CoreDataManagerLogic.html#/s:10I.abstract: The default name of a data model, equals “DataModel”.

Classes/CoreDataManagerLogic.html#/s:10I.name: init(useInMemory:)
Classes/CoreDataManagerLogic.html#/s:10I.abstract: Default initializer of the manager. Call setup afterwards.

Classes/CoreDataManagerLogic.html#/s:10I.name: setup(dataModelName:bundle:storeFolder:completion:)
Classes/CoreDataManagerLogic.html#/s:10I.abstract: Sets up this mananger with a persistence stack on disk.

Classes/CoreDataManagerLogic.html#/s:10I.name: init(dataModelName:bundle:completion:)
Classes/CoreDataManagerLogic.html#/s:10I.abstract: Alternative initializer to use an in-memory persistence stack
